name: Music Blocks
description:
If the embedded  game is not working, play it here: https://lukki15.github.io/music_blocks/#/ (optimized for mobile / scale down the browser window)

Here we have a small music player app for Jazz, but with a catch.
When opening the app we only hear a background music. To play any other music samples  you need to solve a tetris  like puzzle to fill out the board.

Have fun!

Controls
drag and drop the pices
if you are soft locked, go back and open the puzzle again, to reset

Download
The game is also as apk available to install on your Android phone

Code
The game was implemented in Dart with Flutter
The source code is available here: https://github.com/lukki15/music_blocks

Team
lukki15 - Implementation / game idea - https://github.com/lukki15
Leon Kerner - music / game testging - https://leonkerner.com/
Maria Mifka - Art / Jazz music covers - https://www.deviantart.com/artfreak-xd
